text: Omatsone Folarin "Sone" Aluko (born 19 February 1989) is a professional footballer who plays as a forward or winger for Ipswich Town. His sister is Eniola. She played for the England women's national team 102 times. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National Cup League Cup
